SELECT
art.CREATE_TIME_ AS startTime, art.CREATE_TIME_ AS endTime, trp.CURRENT_TASK_STATUS AS taskState FROM act_ru_task AS art LEFT JOIN t_ru_task AS trt ON art.ID_ =trt.TASK_ID LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst AS ahp ON art.PROC_INST_ID_=ahp.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN t_ru_procinst AS trp ON art.PROC_INST_ID_=trp.PROC_INST_ID WHERE trp.APP_KEY = #{appKey} AND art.SUSPENSION_STATE_=1 AND ((trt.ASSIGNEE_REAL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{assignee},'%')) OR (trt.ASSIGNEE_TYPE = 2 AND trt.ASSIGNEE IN(#{roleId}))) ORDER BY endTime DESC

SELECT
art.START_TIME_ AS startTime, art.END_TIME_ AS endTime, (CASE WHEN art.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE '%_Y%' THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) AS taskState, (CASE WHEN tta.assignee IS NULL THEN #{assignee} ELSE tta.assignee_agent END) AS assigneeDelegate FROM act_hi_taskinst AS art LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst AS ahp ON art.PROC_INST_ID_=ahp.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN t_ru_procinst AS trp ON art.PROC_INST_ID_=trp.PROC_INST_ID LEFT JOIN t_task_agent AS tta ON art.ID_=tta.task_id WHERE trp.APP_KEY = #{appKey} AND (art.ASSIGNEE_ LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{assignee},#{taskState}),'%') OR tta.assignee_agent=#{assignee})
ORDER BY endTime DESC

SELECT
art.CREATE_TIME_ AS startTime, art.CREATE_TIME_ AS endTime, 0 AS asked, NULL AS askId, trp.CURRENT_TASK_STATUS AS taskState, NULL AS askTaskKey,
(CASE WHEN (trt.ASSIGNEE_REAL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{assignee},'%')
OR (trt.ASSIGNEE_TYPE = 2 AND trt.ASSIGNEE IN (${roleId}) AND (trt.ASSIGNEE_REAL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{assignee},'%') OR trt.ASSIGNEE_REAL IS NULL)) ) THEN #{assignee} ELSE NULL END ) AS assigneeDelegate
NULL AS assigneeDelegate
FROM act_ru_task AS art LEFT JOIN t_ru_task AS trt ON art.ID_ = trt.TASK_ID LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst AS ahp ON art.PROC_INST_ID_ = ahp.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN t_ru_procinst AS trp ON art.PROC_INST_ID_ = trp.PROC_INST_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM t_ask_task tkk WHERE tkk.is_ask_end=0 ) tat ON tat.current_task_id = art.ID_ WHERE trp.APP_KEY = #{appKey} AND ((trt.ASSIGNEE_REAL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{assignee},'%')
OR (trt.ASSIGNEE_TYPE = 2 AND trt.ASSIGNEE IN (${roleId}) AND (trt.ASSIGNEE_REAL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{assignee},'%') OR trt.ASSIGNEE_REAL IS NULL)) ) OR
((trt.ASSIGNEE_REAL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.assigneeAgent},'%')
OR (trt.ASSIGNEE_TYPE = 2 AND trt.ASSIGNEE IN (${item.agentRoleId}) AND (trt.ASSIGNEE_REAL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{assignee},'%') OR trt.ASSIGNEE_REAL IS NULL))
) AND trp.proc_def_key IN (${item.processDefinitionKey})
AND DATE(art.CREATE_TIME_) >= DATE(#{item.agentStartDate})
AND DATE(art.CREATE_TIME_) <= DATE(#{item.agentEndDate}) )
) AND art.SUSPENSION_STATE_=1
AND trp.proc_def_key=#{procDefKey}
AND (tat.is_ask_end IS NULL OR tat.is_ask_end =1)
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT
FROM (SELECT * FROM t_ask_task ttk WHERE ttk.is_ask_end=0) tat LEFT JOIN act_hi_taskinst AS art ON tat.asked_task_id = art.ID_ OR tat.current_task_id=art.ID_ LEFT JOIN t_ru_task AS trt ON art.ID_ = trt.TASK_ID LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst AS ahp ON art.PROC_INST_ID_ = ahp.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN t_ru_procinst AS trp ON art.PROC_INST_ID_ = trp.PROC_INST_ID WHERE trp.APP_KEY = #{appKey} AND (((tat.ask_user_id = #{assignee} AND tat.current_task_id=art.ID_) OR (tat.asked_user_id = #{assignee} AND tat.asked_task_id = art.ID_))
OR
(((tat.ask_user_id=#{item.assigneeAgent} AND tat.current_task_id=art.ID_) OR (tat.asked_user_id=#{item.assigneeAgent} AND tat.asked_task_id = art.ID_)) AND trp.proc_def_key IN (${item.processDefinitionKey})
AND DATE(tat.create_time) >= DATE(#{item.agentStartDate})
AND DATE(tat.create_time) <= DATE(#{item.agentEndDate}) )
)
ORDER BY startTime DESC

SELECT
art.CREATE_TIME_ AS startTime, art.CREATE_TIME_ AS endTime FROM act_ru_task AS art LEFT JOIN t_ru_task AS trt ON art.ID_ =trt.TASK_ID LEFT JOIN act_hi_procinst AS ahp ON art.PROC_INST_ID_=ahp.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN t_ru_procinst AS trp ON art.PROC_INST_ID_=trp.PROC_INST_ID WHERE trp.APP_KEY = #{appKey} AND trt.ASSIGNEE_TYPE = 2 AND trt.ASSIGNEE IN (${roleId}) AND art.SUSPENSION_STATE_=1

SELECT DISTINCT trp.* FROM `t_ru_procinst` AS trp LEFT JOIN `act_ru_execution` AS are ON trp.`proc_inst_id`=are.`ID_` AND trp.`proc_inst_id`=are.`PROC_INST_ID_` WHERE trp.`business_key`=#{businessKey} AND trp.`app_key`=#{appKey} AND are.`SUSPENSION_STATE_`=#{suspensionState}
